nodes.bodyText: This part always worked, producing the java.  Is there a place where we can actually cook and evaluate this code to verify that it does't cause an exception?  I think there used to be a CodeGenRunnerTest.    It would be great to have a test there.
The cooking part would pass with the earlier code as well
The code choked during runtime with janino 3.0.7 and jdk 11. It compiled (cooked) just fine. idk how to test for the differing runtime environments.
